Verses: 1 avargaludaiya Koottaththaarellaarum Ezhundhirundhu, Avaraip Pilaaththuvinidaththirkuk Kondupoi,
2 ivan Thannaik Kiristhu Ennappatta Raajaavendrum, Raayarukku Vari Kodukkavenduvadhillaiyendrum Solli, Janangalaik Kalagappaduththak Kandom Endru Avarmel Kutranjaattaththodanginaargal.
3 pilaaththu Avarai Nokki: Nee Yoodharudaiya Raajaavaa Endru Kettaan. Avar Avanukkup Piradhiyuththaramaaga: Neer Sollugirabadidhaan Endraar.
4 appozhudhu Pilaaththu Piradhaana Aasaariyargalaiyum Janangalaiyum Nokki: Indha Manushanidaththil Naan Oru Kutraththaiyum Kaanavillai Endraan.
5 adharku Avargal: Ivan Galileyaa Naadu Thodangi Ivvidamvaraikkum Yoodheyaadhesamengum Ubadhesampanni, Janangalaik Kalagappaduththugiraan Endru Vairaakkiyaththode Sonnaargal.
6 galileyaa Enpadhaip Pilaaththu Kettapozhudhu, Indha Manushan Galileyanaa Endru Visaariththu,
7 avar Erodhin Adhigaaraththukkullaanavar Endrarindhu, Annaatkalil Erusalemile Vandhirundha Erodhuvinidaththirku Avarai Anuppinaan.

8 erodhu Yesuvaikkuriththu Anega Kaariyangalaik Kelvippattirundhadhinaalum, Avaraal Seyyappadum Adaiyaalaththaip Paarkkavendumendru Virumbiyirundhadhinaalum, Avaraik Kaanumpadi Vegunaalaai Aasaikondirundhaan. Andhappadi Avaraik Kandapodhu, Migavum Sandhoshappattu,
9 anega Kaariyangalaikkuriththu Avaridaththil Vinaavinaan. Avar Marumozhiyaaga Avanukku Ondrum Sollavillai.
10 piradhaana Aasaariyarum Vedhabaaragarum Avarmel Pidivaadhamaaik Kutranjaattikkonde Nindraargal.
11 appozhudhu Erodhu Than Porchsevagarodukooda Avarai Nindhiththup Pariyaasampanni, Minukkaana Vasthiraththai Avarukku Uduththi, Avaraith Thirumbap Pilaaththuvinidaththirku Anuppinaan.
12 munne Oruvarukkoruvar Pagaivaraayirundha Pilaaththuvum Erodhum Andraiyaththinam Sinegidharaanaargal.
13 pilaaththu Piradhaana Aasaariyargalaiyum Adhigaarigalaiyum Janangalaiyum Koodivarachseydhu,

14 avargalai Nokki: Janangalaik Kalagaththukkuth Thoondividugiravanaaga Indha Manushanai Ennidaththil Konduvandheergal. Naan Ungalukku Munbaaga Visaariththapodhu, Ivanmel Neengal Saattugira Kutrangalil Ondraiyum Naan Ivanidaththil Kaanavillai.
15 ungalai Erodhinidaththirkum Anuppinen; Avarum Ivanidaththil Kutram Kaanavillai: Maranaththukkedhuvaaga Ivan Ondrum Seyyavillaiye,
16 aanapadiyaal Ivanai Thandiththu, Vidudhalaiyaakkuven Endraan.
17 pandigaidhorum Avargalukku Oruvanai Avan Vidudhalaiyaakkuvadhu Avasiyamaayirundhapadiyaal Appadich Sonnaan.
18 janangalellaarum Adhaik Kettu: Ivanai Agatrum, Barabaasai Engalukku Vidudhalaiyaakkum Endru Saththamittuk Kettaargal.
19 andhap Barabaasenbavan Nagaraththil Nadandha Oru Kalagaththinimiththamum Kolaibaadhagaththinimiththamum Kaavalile Vaikkappattirundhaan.
20 pilaaththu Yesuvai Vidudhalaiyaakka Manadhaai, Marubadiyum Avargalidaththil Pesinaan.
21 avargalo: Avanaich Siluvaiyil Araiyum, Siluvaiyil Araiyum Endru Kookkuralittaargal.

22 avan Moondraandharam Avargalai Nokki: En, Ivan Enna Pollaappuch Seydhaan? Maranaththukku Edhuvaana Kutram Ondrum Ivanidaththil Naan Kaanavillaiye; Aagaiyaal Naan Ivanaith Thandiththu, Vidudhalaiyaakkuven Endraan.
23 appadiyirundhum Avaraich Siluvaiyil Araiyavendumendru Avargal Uraththa Saththaththodu Kettukkondeyirundhaargal. Avargalum Piradhaana Aasaariyarum Itta Saththam Merkondadhu.
24 appozhudhu Avargal Kettukkondapadiye Aagattum Endru Pilaaththu Theerppuseydhu,
25 kalagaththinimiththamum Kolaibaadhagaththinimiththamum Kaavalil Podappattirundhavanai Avargal Kettukkondapadiye Vidudhalaiyaakki, Yesuvaiyo Avargal Ishtaththukku Oppukkoduththaan.
26 avargal Yesuvaik Kondupogirapodhu, Naattilirundhu Varugira Sirene Ooraanaagiya Seemon Engira Oruvanaip Pidiththu, Siluvaiyai Avar Pinne Sumandhukonduvarumpadi Adhai Avanmel Vaiththaargal.
27 thiralkoottamaana Janangalum Avarukkaagap Pulambi Azhugira Sthireegalum Avarukkup Pinsendraargal.
28 yesu Avargal Mugamaaith Thirumbi: Erusalemin Kumaaraththigale, Neengal Enakkaaga Azhaamal, Ungalukkaagavum Ungal Pillaigalukkaagavum Azhungal.
29 idho, Maladigal Baakkiyavadhigalendrum, Pillaiperaadha Karppangalum Paalkodaadha Mulaigalum Baakkiyamullavaigalendrum Sollappadum Naatkalvarum.
30 appozhudhu Malaigalai Nokki: Engalmel Vizhungalendrum, Kundrugalai Nokki: Engalai Maraiththukkollungalendrum Sollaththodanguvaargal.
31 pachchaimaraththukku Ivaigalaich Seydhaal, Pattamaraththukku Enna Seyyamaattaargal Endraar.
32 kutravaaligalaagiya Vere Iranduperum Avarodekoodak Kolaiseyyappaduvadharkuk Kondupogappattaargal.

33 kabaalasdhalam Endru Sollappatta Idaththil Avargal Serndhapozhudhu, Avaraiyum, Avarudaiya Valadhupakkaththil Oru Kutravaaliyaiyum, Avarudaiya Idadhupakkaththil Oru Kutravaaliyaiyum Siluvaigalil Araindhaargal.
34 appozhudhu Yesu: Pidhaave Ivargalukku Manniyum, Thaangal Seygiradhu Innadhendru Ariyaadhirukkiraargale Endraar. Avarudaiya Vasthirangalai Avargal Pangittuch Seettuppottaargal.

35 janangal Nindru Paarththukkondirundhaargal. Avargaludane Kooda Adhigaarigalum Avarai Igazhndhu: Ivan Matravargalai Ratchiththaan, Ivan Dhevanaal Therindhukollappatta Kiristhuvaanaal Thannaiththaane Ratchiththukkollattum Endraargal.
36 porchsevagarum Avaridaththil Serndhu, Avarukkuk Kaadiyaik Koduththu:
37 nee Yoodharin Raajaavaanaal, Unnai Ratchiththukkol Endru Avaraip Pariyaasampanninaargal.
38 ivan Yoodharudaiya Raajaa Endru, Girekku Laththeen Ebireyu Ezhuththukkalil Ezhudhi, Avarukku Melaaga Vaikkappattadhu.
39 andriyum Siluvaiyil Araiyappattirundha Kutravaaligalil Oruvan: Nee Kirisdhuvaanaal Unnaiyum Engalaiyum Ratchiththukkol Endru Avarai Igazhndhaan.
40 matravan Avanai Nokki: Nee Indha Aakkinaikkutpattavanaayirundhum Dhevanukkup Bayappadugiradhillaiyaa?
41 naamo Niyaayappadi Dhandikkappadugirom Naam Nadappiththavaigalukkuththakka Balanai Adaigirom; Ivaro Thagaadhadhondraiyum Nadappikkavillaiye Endru Avanaik Kadindhukondu,
42 yesuvai Nokki: Aandavare, Neer Ummudaiya Raajyaththil Varumbodhu Adiyenai Ninaiththarulum Endraan.
43 yesu Avanai Nokki: Indraikku Nee Ennudanekoodap Paradheesiliruppaai Endru Meyyaagave Unakkuch Sollugiren Endraar.
44 appozhudhu Erakkuraiya Aaraammani Neramaayirundhadhu; Onbadhaammani Neram Varaikkum Boomiyengum Andhagaaramundaayitru.
45 sooriyan Iruladaindhadhu, Dhevaalayaththin Thiraichcheelai Naduvil Irandaagak Kizhindhadhu.
46 yesu: Pidhaave, Ummudaiya Kaigalil En Aaviyai Oppuvikkiren Endru Magaa Saththamaaik Kooppittuchsonnaar; Ippadich Cholli, Jeevanaivittaar.
47 nootrukku Adhibadhi Sambaviththadhaik Kandu: Meyyaagave Indha Manushan Needhibaranaayirundhaan Endru Solli, Dhevanai Magimaippaduththinaan.
48 indhak Kaatchiyaip Paarkkumbadi Koodivandhirundha Janangalellaarum Sambaviththavaigalaip Paarththapozhudhu, Thangal Maarbil Adiththukkondu Thirumpipponaargal.
49 avarukku Arimugamaanavargalellaarum, Galileyaavilirundhu Avarukkuppinsendru Vandha Sthireegalum Dhooraththile Nindru Ivaigalaip Paarththukkondirundhaargal.
50 yoseppu Ennum Perkonda Oru Aalosanaikkaaran Irundhaan; Avan Uththamanum Needhimaanumaayirundhaan.

51 avan Yoodharudaiya Pattanangalilondraagiya Arimaththiyaavilirundhu Vandhavanum, Dhevanudaiya Raajyaththukkuk Kaaththirundhavanum, Yoodhargaludaiya Aalosanaikkum Seygaikkum Sammadhiyaadhavanumaayirundhaan.
52 avan Pilaaththuvinidaththil Poi, Yesuvin Sareeraththaik Kettu,
53 adhai Irakki, Melliya Dhuppattiyile Sutri, Kanmalaiyil Vettappattadhumaai Orukkaalum Oruvanum Vaikkappadaadhadhumaayirundha Oru Kallaraiyile Vaiththaan.
54 andha Naal Aayaththanaalaayirundhadhu; Oivunaalum Aarambamaayitru.
55 galileyaavilirundhu Avarudane Kooda Vandhirundha Sthireegalum Pinsendru Kallaraiyaiyum Avarudaiya Sareeram Vaikkappatta Vidhaththaiyum Paarththu,
56 thirumbippoi, Kandhavarkkangalaiyum Parimalathailangalaiyum Aayaththampanni, Karpanaiyinpadiye Oivunaalil Oindhirundhaargal.
